sentences.sContent: I'm proud to say that I handled it nicely in the moment, but I'm embarrassed to admit how much this characterization annoyed me.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'm proud to say that I handled it nicely in the moment, but I'm embarrassed to admit how much this characterization annoyed me.
sentences.sCn: 我很自豪当时自己很好地应对了这一情况，但是不好意思，我要承认这个人的描述方式惹恼了我。

sentences.sContent: Assemble prototype optical systems including subassemblies and integration with camera systems, characterization and trouble shoot.
sentences.sContent_eng: Assemble prototype optical systems including subassemblies and integration with camera systems, characterization and trouble shoot.
sentences.sCn: 组装样机光学系统，包括组件及与摄像系统集成，特性描述和故障检修。

words.tran: 典型的；特有的；表示特性的
无个性的；缺乏特征的；平凡的
性格，品质；特性；角色；[计] 字符
在文艺作品中塑造人物；描绘性格
描绘…的特性；具有…的特征

trans.tranOther: the way in which the character of a real person or thing is described
